review: Phenergan (promethazine):Started taking this about a year ago it worked ok but gave me awful restless leg syndrome. Did not take it for a while then started again, worked ok for sleep but I felt short tempered and low mood. It is worth a try as everyone reacts differently from it

25mg dosage to aid sleep. Does not make me tired even taking 2 hrs before. Hit and miss with sleeping longer but sleep periods shrinking again the longer I'm on it. Can't really say it is working for me.

Phenergan (promethazine):I had taken 25mgs at 22:00 to help  me sleep at 2am took another because still awake! Now 3:30am still awake. I am drowsy but my whole body feels weird kinda irritating sensation it's awful.  I am going to have a cup of tea (caffeine) to see if it will counteract this horrible weird sensation. No more phergan for me that's for sure. I feel I have to move around all the time.

Phenergan (promethazine):This medication transformed my life. I have ADHD, I can sleep through the whole night and have been using it for years. It helps me slow down my brain, so I am able to get deeper uninterrupted sleep.

Phenergan (promethazine):Almost magic, treating insomnia it works better than my ambien & after waking up I won't discover I have emptied the cookie jar or fridge like has happened on ambien a few times. The downside of phenergan is how long it works, yes the next morning there is some lingering fatigue but it fades & coffee clears that fast. For nausea which I get a lot, it also helps without giving you the gift of constipation like zofran does. Phenergan gets an "A" rating in my book.

Works great for me, I try and take a 1/4 of a 25 mg tablet around 7 pm. It has a huge effect,  and stops palpitations. I do feel a little down the next day until 12 ish . But well worth taking ! Take early !
promethazine is my magic pilll that enables me to sleep. I awake in the morning so calm my head clear and focused.

I took this tablet promethazine today first time for light sedation, my GP prescribed 50mg. There was no effect first 20 minutes but after an hour it knocked me out until next day still felt very drowsy.Did the job but think I will take half from now on.

Phenergan (promethazine):This does the job for stressful periods of insomnia, but I wouldnâ€™t recommend it if you have something important to wake up for the next morning - one 25mg pill makes me feel drowsy for hours after waking

Phenergan (promethazine):My sleep is terrible.  Phenergan helped but it made me anxious and shivery if I didn't take it and jump into bed straight away to settle.  I'd sleep well but wake the next day feeling like I'd been hit by a truck and low in mood.  It does help with sleep but it's not for me.  Back to insomnia for me.
Phenergan (promethazine):I use whenever I want to ensure a good night's, uninterrupted, non-fitful sleep. Seems to work every time. A relative, and a neighbour I know, have similar success.

Phenergan (promethazine):I've had trouble sleeping and waking up all night for  years tried every natural sleep aid  and  none work . I won't ever try prescription sleeping pills. I was told about these  otc med and they really help. I'm sleeping for longer  and not waking . There has been no side effects, so so far so good

Anergan 50 (promethazine):Only thing that helps me sleep.  I cut the 25 mg. In half and that helps me settle down.  I also combine that with 0.5 mg of klonopin.  I am 77 years old and have suffered with insomnia for many, many years.  I do not do well with anti-depressants so I avoid them.  Wish I can forgo klonopin but have been on it for 10 years.  Should have never started any mind controlling drug.

Promethazine was prescribed twice to me for mild sedation by my neurological doctor. I tried in in doses between 10mg  and higher. This doesn't make me drowsy unless I'd had pain also and taken  an opioid with it. The only effect I received was the taste of it. The second time it was given to me instead of zopiclone. Still, no effect.I tried it once as a treatment for nausea; 40mg. didn`t work.

I have been taking Promethazine 25mg tablets as needed for nausea for about 5 years. 1 pill would completely take away my nausea, even if I had the flu. However, the first time taking 1 pill knocked me out. You can build up a tolerance fairly quickly if you take them daily. I also have taken 1 to 2 pills to sleep through the night if im off work the next day because they make me groggy for a few hours the next morning. They don't make me feel "out of it" like Xanax and I have never developed any type of addiction to them either.
I suffer bad tinnitus and don't get much sleep I take 2 of these tablets but they don't work :/

I came across this by accident and after two tablets all my medical ailments disappeared (anxiety, stress and IBS-D) . Off diazapam and Imodium now . Amazing after 40 years of misery that I can now enjoy life. Plus no sleeping tablets now either --- result !!!!
Phenergan (promethazine):Beautiful sleep every night
The phenergan shot works well at sedating me. The other forms that it comes in - such as pill, syrup, and suppository do not provide the same sedating effect for me.
Phenergan (promethazine):I took the recommended dose and was extremely drowsy yet angry and restless. It was like I wanted to scream out of frustration but was too tired and edgy.

Phenergan (promethazine):This is my magic pill.  I suffer from vertigo, chronic spinal pain, sleeplessness, mild depression because of the spinal pain, and usually I get sick to my stomach with even one aspirin. I take 1/2 of one pill of this every night before bed and sleep like a baby and awake feeling rested, happy, and nausea-free.  I hope the vertigo is gone too but haven't taken this long enough to know about that.  I take small doses of everything because I feel the effects of any medicine very strongly.  WHY hasn't a doctor offered this to me before?
Phenergan (promethazine):This medication helps me sleep very soundly but I usually wake feeling quite groggy and often feeling a bit depressed.

Phenergan (promethazine):I suffered a reaction to this product. I bought it for help with sleeping and I  was unable to sit or lie down for the restless nerve endings that lasted all night and most of the following day.
Phenergan (promethazine):I sleep great with this medication.
